creditline: Given in memory of Adeline S. Boyd of St. Louis by her daughter and with thanks to Deepak and Purnima Kantawala of Mumbai
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: front of album leaf has 2 small text blocks at top and image below; standing woman at left points at 2 flying birds in URC, being shot at by a seated man with rifle; another seated man with rifle and standing man at left; text on back
title: Untitled (shooting birds)
